Text:
Alvin Nathaniel Joiner IV (born September 18, 1974), is better known by his stage name Xzibit (pronounced as "ex-hib-it"). He is also known for hosting MTV's Pimp My Ride. He released a new album every two years from his 1996 debut At the Speed of Life until his most recent Full Circle which was released in October 2006... and now we have MMX...
